import React from'react';import{useRouteMatch}from'react-router-dom';import Film from'./Film';import ShowInfo from'./ShowInfo';function FilmsList(_ref){var listOfFilms=_ref.listOfFilms;var match=useRouteMatch();return match.params.id!==undefined// eslint-disable-next-line max-len
